params._contributionAmount: USDC amount each participant must contribute
params._gracePeriod: Grace period for late payments in seconds

returns._0: tandaId ID of the newly created Tanda

params.tandaId: ID of the Tanda to check
ID of the Tanda requesting randomness

params._nativePayment: Whether to pay for VRF in native token or LINK
params._numWords: New number of random words to request

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

getTandaAddress(uint256).notice: Get Tanda contract address by ID

getTandaData(uint256).notice: Get comprehensive Tanda data for frontend display

requestRandomnessForTanda(uint256).notice: Request randomness for payout order assignment

requestRandomnessForTandaTest(uint256).notice: Request randomness for payout order assignment (test function)

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.
